name: Knaves' Needs
description:
Additional swords for Simply Swords. 
 
 Special thanks to the following people for their contributions/influence on this mod: 
 - Sweeney/Sweenuss, for creating Simply Swords and supporting this addon.
- Chronos_Sacaria, for their support and help with the mod.
- LostLandFound, for creating and editing the textures for this project.
- daedelus, for creating Better Combat and helping this mod support it.
- Shedaniel, for creating Architectury. 
 - The Twilight Forest Team, for creating Twilight Forest. 
 - The BetterX team, for creating BetterNether/BetterEnd and bclib. 
 - Marium/mariumbacchus, for creating Soulslike Weaponry.
